verses.t: Hear{H8085} my cry{H7440}, O God{H430}; attend{H7181} unto my prayer{H8605}.
From the end{H7097} of the earth{H776} will I cry{H7121} unto thee, when my heart{H3820} is overwhelmed{H5848}: lead{H5148} me to the rock{H6697} that is higher{H7311} than I.
For thou hast been a shelter{H4268} for me, and a strong{H5797} tower{H4026} from{H6440} the enemy{H341}.
I will abide{H1481} in thy tabernacle{H168} for ever{H5769}: I will trust{H2620} in the covert{H5643} of thy wings{H3671}. Selah{H5542}.trust: or, make my refuge
For thou, O God{H430}, hast heard{H8085} my vows{H5088}: thou hast given{H5414} me the heritage{H3425} of those that fear{H3373} thy name{H8034}.

Thou wilt prolong{H3254} the king's{H4428} life{H3117}: and his years{H8141} as many{H1755} generations{H1755}.Thou…: Heb. Thou shalt add days to the days of the kingas…: Heb. as generation and generation
He shall abide{H3427} before{H6440} God{H430} for ever{H5769}: O prepare{H4487} mercy{H2617} and truth{H571}, which may preserve{H5341} him.
So will I sing{H2167} praise unto thy name{H8034} for ever{H5703}, that I may daily{H3117} perform{H7999} my vows{H5088}.
